      • manageLoadsHistory

        public void manageLoadsHistory()
        This method manage le load history of a HC to put or delete a number of rodents in cells after extrapolate by the following calculation :
            n : for each cell, n = the number of rat that was brought into (if n > 0) or taken from (if n < 0) the cell.
            multiplicator = sleepLength / activityLength (ex: 11/1 : sleep 11 and active 1 month ).
            Thus by extrapolation, the number of rats to delete or to put in the cell is :
            n * multiplicator ex:
                  if n = 1, 1*11/1 = 11 rats more. At total 12+1 rats in the yeat)
                  if n = 2, 2*11/1 = 22 rats more. At total 22+2 rats in the yeat)
        Parameters:
        timeCondensed - of a HC
